DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether prenatal ovarian cyst aspiration is effective and safe to prevent perinatal ovarian torsion.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Fetal Ovarian Cyst Aspiration to Prevent Torsion
DOC.detailed_description: With the widespread use of routine sonography during pregnancy, the incidence of fetal ovarian cysts detected in utero has increased in the past decades. However
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women having an uneventful single pregnancy and a female fetus diagnosed with anechoic ovarian cyst (diameter at least 30mm) Multiple pregnancy Complicated pregnancy (PE, diabetes, PROM, fetal malformation) Echoic cyst (fluid debris level, septated, retracting clot, globally echoic) Unability to give informed consent
